examples.text: My first name is Wella. W-E-L-L-A. I'm seeking guidance on career advice, career guidance.
Career reading?
Okay. Okay. I want to know about my future. What is there in future?
Well, I want to know if... what the future brings...
Love reading. Nine of clubs. What about the nine of clubs? The temperance. Sagittarius. Love reading.
Can I ask questions about love in a text and get answers in a text, or do I have to speak to somebody in person?
Example question 2
Example question 3

Energy, healing, definitely. And I am an empath, have strong intuitions. I have strong readings of people and rooms. Sometimes when something comes over me, it's very specific. Sometimes it's just to be a vessel to them because they just needed somebody to come talk to them. And I happen to be there to be that person to just say, hey, I like your shoes. And that leads to something else. And I cannot leave a room if that feeling comes over me. Like, I have to press forward with it. Like, I help people in all walks of life. I empathize with people through my own experiences. But like the things that are very interesting is how I can just walk into a room and all of a sudden to a stranger know something that I need to tell them. And it just happens. I've had people call me the next week and be like, how do you, how did you know that? And just, I don't know where it comes from.
Family?
My name is Akanksha. I am looking for a psychic who deals with family matters.
Can you tell how my son passed away?
Whether or not I'm going to get my ex back?
There is a considerable communication gap between me and my husband from last one year. I would like to know when and how it will resolve.
Will there be a reconciliation?

Yes, I love to help people. It's quite interesting because my dad was a fire chief. He was a paramedic and he was a police officer. And I don't know if that runs through the blood or not, but like I just naturally love to help others. And as soon as I see someone in need, like I do not think twice, even if it might put my life in danger. I know that might sound reckless to others, but my body does it before I can think like I just want to help.
Looking for a love psychic that's direct?
How can I find jobs abroad like Portugal?
I have been laid off last month so I was looking for a job. So in that curiosity I want to know whether in what time I will get the job.
That's kinda neat. I'd like to connect with family members that have passed. Do you have any psychics who are really good at maybe speaking to the people that have passed?

I used to not be because I wanted to push boundaries. As a child, I was raised very strict in my religion. And so all it did was want me to explore any and everything I could. Now, as I've gotten older, of course, I've deciphered what's important and what's not. But I still like to push boundaries. But like I said, I want to go for ones that, you know, will help better my life and not be for no reason.
I'm concerned about her happiness and my first name is Carol.
I believe there's good in everyone. You just, you know, got to talk it out and figure it out. And I want to help do that. But I also have many other things to it.
Where will this information go to? Because I don't want my information to be publisherized. So I don't want it to be sent by everyone on the internet.
Well, I didn't give you an email address. How will they contact me?
Example question 4

Oh my goodness. I'm so sorry. I talk a lot, so it was a lot of information about me helping people and how I was in a bad relationship, and by the time I got out of it, I didn't have any friends anymore, and now I'm just stuck here in this weird place. Like, I'm okay being alone, but like...I would like something every now and then because...I just want to help people and have all this stuff that I want to share, and I'm a very passionate person, and I used to have a ton of friends, and it's crazy when you go through something like that. I didn't even know I was in it until it was too late, and then like...I'm out of it now. Nobody's here. I don't know what to do because I love to sing. You know, I love poetry. That's what we were talking about. Sorry I'm talking so much, but that's just what was going on in the last conversation.

Do you have to use cards when you do those type of readings? Because I love to, like, make people feel better. And, like, if they're feeling down, I don't want to, like, shove it down their throat or, like – I don't – I won't mess with them or, like, go overboard. Like, I just want to give them a path. And, like, if they're feeling it then we can keep going. But do you have to have cards to do that?
Not really, but... Career? I'm thinking about career. But the thing is that I don't know if I believe and trust this topic. Okay.

Good question. But when it comes to career, I just want to take a big step and do something different that I'm doing actually right now. And I just want to start working different and take a big risk, but not sure if I should do this or not.
What does clairvoyance mean?
What is that exactly?
Example question 5
There is a Saturn transit today. So what will be the effect on my birth chart or my future?
When my kid will start talking?

Hello? Right now, love. I am very tangled in my relationship with a married person that I told you that I am married and in love with a younger girl. So, I want guidance on what should I do? Please guide me through it right now. Hello! Here is the money! I saw it! Okay, here is your money.
Hmm... okay, great, because I would love to rate you and talk about your service

I do not ever hear voices. All of a sudden, I can walk into a room and sometimes I just read energies. And so sometimes like I can tell if somebody has a wall up and it's almost like a really good challenge for the both of us. And that is like something that is so fun for me to do is like go straight to that person. And then by the end of it, they're like, I didn't think that I would like you or that we could be friends. And I said, I already knew that. Like I read your energy or I can go into a room and I'll be like shopping or whatever. And all of a sudden something just so strong comes over me and I'm like, I can't move. My mom says like she can tell when it comes over me, especially when I just take off to a stranger and I ask them politely, like something just came over me. I just want to let you know everything's going to be okay. Like, you know, and it's okay if you would like me to step away, you know, like, or I like numbers. Like my dad passed away and my grandmother passed away. And right now I'm actually looking at their numbers and like connecting and going back and doing that. And like how it's connecting to so many things that's opening up. Like it's blowing my mind. And also I like to know the meanings of people's names and that sometimes the feelings that come over me are so spot on specific, like to the scent, if it's like about money or something. And then sometimes it's just pure energy to make somebody happy, you know, make them positive that day. Like I'm their person for that day or something. I don't know what to call that. But yeah, it's a lot of fun and it's really important for me to be able to do this kind of thing with my kids and my kids are really good at this stuff.

I have never done that before, but I've been wanting to explore it or do my own research. But I don't know how you say you're a psychic or how you say you're this or that. These things just have happened to me. It started when I was 13 years old. I had an older lady in my church, and for some reason I was shown that she was struggling really, really bad. And it came over me that she was going to get a check in the mail for a certain amount of money that was going to fix everything at that moment for her. And like I said, I was only 13 years old, and I told her all of that and the amount, and it happened. And after that, it kept happening. And also, I quit going to funerals because I found that, like, when I was younger than you guys were doing this stuff with your kids or whatever you guys did with your kids or whatever you guys did with your kids, and not as closed off, their spirits would try to bug me. And I was not, I don't like that as much as connecting for positivity. Not that they're not positive, but it freaked me out, so I kind of closed that off.
Example question 6
No, I will not go away because my financial position is not good so i cannot go with it.
Not address and i will call again if i find if have a better source or better income.
Okay, thank you so much for your information and yeah, I don't think I have money right now but when I have money I will come back and check.
Yes, and now I'm not comfortable. I will come back when I'm ready and have the money to pay then, and do everything.
How do I get my free 10 minutes?
Do I get free 10 minutes?

Well, and also probably because I have a really country drawl. I'm from Calhoun, Louisiana, and I don't mind sharing it with people because you can get it, you know, so easily these days anyways. And I'm really I love meeting new people anyways. Like I would love to meet a friend right now.

Who's into poetry? I've never, I didn't know you could pick them based on that. That would be so cool because I keep writing my poem over and over. Like it's not completely done yet because I keep changing up words and I love looking up definitions and synonyms and anonyms, like not even just to rhyme, like just to like get deeper wording, like in my poems and stuff and like try to express myself so much better. But I don't know why I even do that because I don't even tell anybody or share it with anybody. I don't know why I do it.
Could you repeat that?
What?
I'm from India. My name is Chirag, I was born in Pune and my birth date is 16 June 1997 and my birth time is 5.21 pm.
Hello, my name is Chirag.
Where can I find this psychic you're talking about?
Can you set up a reading with one of them for me?
Yes, I would like that.
I would like to talk to Ricky.
I'm curious about how readings work.
How do I select a psychic?
Did you take bath?
Do you know astrology?
Wait, wait, wait Lily I don't really believe in psychics do you have a what do you have to say to that?
Are the psychics real or are they I?
No, when you call the psychic, is it just one subject or can you talk about different subjects with the psychic? Yes.
No, are you going to connect me with a psychic? No.
Yes, I want to be part of creating events like festivals or any concerts in this category. So this is what I want to do. I want to work in the industry, in the music events.
Awesome! What was that experience like?
I would first like to have a free reading.

I need somebody that is going to be very understanding, somebody that's very passionate, someone that doesn't get worked up a lot because of my ADHD and anxiety and my tendency to sometimes over talk. It's only because I'm so interested in it. But I am aware that I do over talk sometimes. I am aware of it and I try not to be. So I need someone that like can have that type of personality but also have the needs that I need to better services for other people.
Yeah, link is good. Can you set this all up for me?
How do I add my name?
I need a medium to read my husband and see if he has a bad entity attached to him.
What did the newspaper say? My mother's newspaper, yeah. You remember that? So, yeah. She's got that firm voice.

Every morning he would say his story and he'd start arguing with his... for your birthday, yeah... So I get mad and I get the papers new and say, you're a warrior! And he's... As long as you're not on video! Yeah.
You say that you are that person, though. Like what qualifies you to be that person? Like how do I prove that that's happening to me other than my passion and stories?
Wait, wait, wait Lily I don't really believe in psychics do you have a what do you have to say to that?
No, when you call the psychic, is it just one subject or can you talk about different subjects with the psychic? Yes.
I'm curious about how readings work.

Well, this week I talked to one and they told me that this guy was going to come back into my life for a second chance. And it was so crazy because the next day, the guy that I was thinking about that I'd never told the psychic his name or anything, he called me. And when he said he would never call me again. But what happened at the end was awful. He only did it to get back at me because I didn't go out on a date with him because of a medical problem I had during that time. So he let me get ready for a date and stood me up. And it was very sad because, like, I cleaned my house and everything and, like, got ready. And I just got out of that other relationship. So that kind of, like, I don't know, maybe I just didn't read the psychic, you know, maybe I didn't, maybe it wasn't for him. I don't know.
Did I break the AI? Jesus Christ... Awful company...

No they had no idea what i was going through i just lost my daddy and i was in an abusive relationship and i didn't have a license. I have two kids like, I just needed to know where my clarity was in this life and they wouldn't even, they were so smart aleck and rude to me i cried.
No, I will not go away because my financial position is not good so i cannot go with it.

I'm still kind of nervous about it, so that's why I keep talking to you, so maybe I can get the courage to do it again. And also, I talk a lot because I don't get to talk to anybody ever except I have a daughter when she comes home from school. But she's a teenager, so she doesn't talk a lot. And I have ADHD, so I get hyper-focused and don't mean to talk this much but...I'm really lonely. Sorry!
No, no, no, no! I just need some clarity.
No, that's fine. I can ask her to be my reader.
But what is the use if i cannot pay them? I want free one.
Not address and i will call again if i find if have a better source or better income.
Not really. Thank you.
Not really.
Doesn't matter. That's kind of a dumb question. Why are you asking me that so randomly?
Not really, but... Career? I'm thinking about career. But the thing is that I don't know if I believe and trust this topic. Okay.
No, there is no such concern.
I might need to turn my TV down.
I'm sorry, because you stopped talking and I think you thought it was me talking and I just noticed that my TV was a little too loud. I'm ready.
I'm probably playing FIFA, chilling around with family and friends, nothing much, nothing hectic.
What will they do with my information? I do not trust this now.
Where will this information go to? Because I don't want my information to be publisherized. So I don't want it to be sent by everyone on the internet.
I wanna know if me and my husband's gonna come into some money.
I'm concerned about her happiness and my first name is Carol.
I want to know if he's going to pursue me.
Well, I want to know if... what the future brings...
Sorry.
I have ADHD. I'm so sorry.
I don't know, just need to talk to a psychic.
Yes, I want to know about my career and my love life.
What does clairvoyance mean?
Don't even know what those words mean. I'm sorry. I would have to look them up.
No, I don't.
No, I haven't had one, so any is fine.
It makes me not trust when you're asking me random questions about myself, makes me think you're going to use that to manipulate my reading somehow, so now I'm not sure I trust psychic source.
No, you got it wrong.

I want to get into this so bad and like, I can't believe it's happening. And like stuff like this doesn't happen to me. And then like, so it cut off and I was like, oh my goodness, I got to get her back.
Well, I'm sorry.
Yes, and I appreciate you talking to me through it, but I do understand that, I don't want you to think I'm weird or anything. Like, I know that you're in my computer.
Sorry, I went off subject.

The term "psychic" is often used as a broad umbrella term for someone who possesses heightened intuitive abilities and can perceive information beyond the ordinary senses. However, what you're describing – walking into a room and receiving specific messages for others – is a unique and powerful experience that goes beyond a simple label.

Would you like me to elaborate on that?
